heading: Expert Care & Treatments
intro: Each treatment is tailor made to your needs

items.title: Manual Lymphatic Drainage
items.description: Manual Lymphatic Drainage helps to reduce swelling and detoxes the lymphatic system. The technique is a light skin stretch, without oil, to optimise drainage; it should not be confused with regular massage. Beneficial for lymphoedema/lipoedema management.

items.title: Brazilian Lymphatic Sculpting Massage
items.description: Primarily for cosmetic purposes blending some lymphatic techniques. Sculpting and body-contouring techniques help reduce bloating and water retention. A revitalising massage with a refreshing detox oil.

items.title: Post-Operative Care
items.description: Designed to reduce post-operative swelling. A light skin stretch technique, with no oil, reducing pain and inflammation and speeding healing. Specialised technique using alternate drainage pathways for a compromised lymphatic system.

items.title: Scar Therapy
items.description: Specialised massage with fascial techniques to reduce adhesions and improve range of motion, pain and sensitivity.

items.title: Oncology Care
items.description: A gentle restorative massage adapted to each client, providing relaxation and calming the central nervous system.

items.title: Swedish/Deep Tissue & Indian Head Massage
items.description: Various massage techniques to promote health and wellbeing.

items.title: Lymphatic Facials
items.description: A relaxing facial designed to decongest, reduce puffiness and sculpt the face. Excellent for sinus issues.

items.title: Measuring for Compression
items.description: Made-to-measure compression service for lymphoedema/lipoedema treatment.

items.title: Complete Decongestive Therapy
items.description: Multi-component bandaging service for the treatment of lymphoedema.
